welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Stony Plain, Canada! Get ready to experience the charming small town atmosphere and explore its vibrant art scene and rich history. Enjoy your stay and make the most out of all that this lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Namao Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edmonton International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Edmonton International Airport serves primarily domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Edmonton International Airport serves mainly charter and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
